features.title: Free WHOIS Privacy
features.description: Protect your personal information from spammers and marketers. We keep your data safe, for free, forever.

features.title: Easy DNS Management
features.description: Full control over your domain's DNS records with our simple yet powerful control panel. No technical expertise required.

features.title: Instant Activation
features.description: Your domain is registered and ready to use within minutes of a successful purchase. Get your idea online, faster.

features.title: 24/7 Expert Support
features.description: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to help you with any domain-related questions.
